messages.subject: Pulling rank as well as the stopper on the thread
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes. Start the discussions you hoped to read when you signed onto the list. What are your unschooling hopes and fears and dreams? Joyce Unschooling-dotcom
messages.messageBody:
on 6/22/03 8:48 PM, KathrynJB@... at KathrynJB@... wrote:

> Can we possibly stop?

Yes.

Start the discussions you hoped to read when you signed onto the list.

What are your unschooling hopes and fears and dreams?

Joyce
Unschooling-dotcom moderator

messages.subject: Re: Re: manners/rank
messages.msgSnippet: I may be the only one who feels this way (and please speak up if that s the case), but I am finding this whole conversation about rank really divisve and
messages.messageBody:
I may be the only one who feels this way (and please speak up if that's the
case), but I am finding this whole conversation about rank really divisve and
damagaing to the list. No one seems to really be hearing anyone, and it just
seems so silly.

Can we possibly stop? I know I can just delete it, but it seeps into other
threads, and it has gotten to a point where ...well....it seems to have no
point.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
